item.description:
The BU Japanese Student Association's Omatsuri Festival has been rescheduled to this Sunday! Tickets are still available at $8/ person. You just need to add yourself to the waitlist on the website and they'll have a ticket for you. I'm sorry about the confusion earlier, but the JSA has posted to clear this up:

 

"Hey everyone! You can still get tickets to Omatsuri if you haven't gotten one! Just go to http://bujsa.eventbrite.com/ and add yourself on the waitlist! We have plenty of spots open so we can release tickets to you even though our event is marked as "sold out."

 

Once again, everyone can attend, regardless of whether they bought a ticket previously. Just add yourself to the waiting list.

 

I will not be attending as I cannot make it Sunday, so Sho will be hosting this meetup for us.
item.how_to_find_us: Metcalf Hall on the second floor
item.name: Omatsuri Festival at Boston University
